Header: PM says the present Government has spent the highest funds for development of the village
Content: Prime Minister Ranil Wickremasinghe has said that it is the present Government that has spent a colossal sum on the development of the village. The Prime Minister also vested in the people the newly constructed Baddegama Divisional Secretariat with the intention of making the public service more efficient. The expenditure incurred on it was 87.4 million rupees. The building will house a fully-fledged auditorium with a seating capacity of 300 and also a vehicle park. The Prime Minister handed over Samurdhi entitlements to 1000 low income families within the Baddegama Divisional Secretariat Division. Addressing a function that followed the opening, Prime Minister Ranil Wickremasinghe mentioned that it is the present Government that has spent a highest amount for development that is taking place in the village.
